Class AdoptionRequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • AdoptionRequestManager

  • public class AdoptionRequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The AdoptionRequestManager class creates and changes adoption requests. It also interfaces with the banking system proxy to make sure that a user has paid their $10 fee before creating an adoption request.
    Author:
    Lauren Anderson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Admin admin
      Holds the string that will be displayed to the user.

    • Field Detail

      • admin

        private Admin admin
        Holds the string that will be displayed to the user. The displayString will be passed to the coordinator for display.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdoptionRequestManager

        public AdoptionRequestManager(Admin admin)
        The AdoptionRequestManager constructor. Does not have any fields inputted upon creation. Only one of these will be created in the coordinator.
        Parameters:
        admin - Admin object containing list of all objects

    • Method Detail

      • makeRequest

        public java.lang.String makeRequest(java.lang.String email,
                                    java.lang.String petID,
                                    java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                    java.lang.String address,
                                    java.lang.String leaseRules,
                                    java.lang.String creditNumber,
                                    java.lang.String creditExpire,
                                    java.lang.String date)
        This method creates an adoption request. Adoption requests will only be created in this class using this method.
        Parameters:
        email - User's email.
        petID - A pet ID for a pet that must already be in the system.
        phoneNumber - A user's phone number
        address - A user's full address
        leaseRules - User's lease agreement if they are a renter, community rules if they are a homeowner.
        creditNumber - User's credit card number
        creditExpire - User's credit card expiration date in mm/yy format.
        date - The date passed from the system
        Returns:
        a new AdoptionRequest

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus(AdoptionRequest ar)
        This method goes into the adoption request and determines its status. The adoption request can be approved, denied, pending review, pending response, or cancelled.
        Parameters:
        ar - A pre-existing adoption request
        Returns:
        A String representation of the adoption request's status

      • getRequestsUser

        public java.util.ArrayList<AdoptionRequest> getRequestsUser(java.lang.String email)
        This method goes into the admin class to retrieve all existing adoption requests for a specific user
        Parameters:
        email - A user's email
        Returns:
        A list of adoption requests

      • getRequestsPet

        public java.util.ArrayList<AdoptionRequest> getRequestsPet(java.lang.String petID)
        This method goes into the admin class to retrieve all existing adotion requests for a specific pet
        Parameters:
        petID - A pet's identification number
        Returns:
        A list of adoption requests

      • getRequest

        public AdoptionRequest getRequest(java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String petID)
        This method will retrieve an existing adoption request given a user email and pet id
        Parameters:
        email - A user's email
        petID - A pet's identification number
        Returns:
        the adoption request

      • pay

        public boolean pay(java.lang.String creditNumber,
                   java.lang.String creditExpire)
        This method makes sure a user has paid their $10 fee before creating an adoption request.
        Parameters:
        creditNumber - A user's credit card number
        creditExpire - A user's credit card expiration date in mm/yy format
        Returns:
        true if payment was successful and false if payment was not successful

      • approveRequest

        public java.lang.String approveRequest(AdoptionRequest ar)
        This method changes an adoption request's status to approved
        Parameters:
        ar - A pre-existing adoption request
        Returns:
        The formatted string containing the decision that the adoption request has been approved.

      • denyRequest

        public java.lang.String denyRequest(AdoptionRequest ar)
        This method changes an adoption request's status to denied
        Parameters:
        ar - A preexisting adoption request
        Returns:
        The formatted string containing the decision that the adoption request has been denied.

      • cancelRequest

        public java.lang.String cancelRequest(AdoptionRequest ar)
        This method changes an adoption request's status to cancelled.
        Parameters:
        ar - A preexisting adoption request
        Returns:
        The formatted string containing the cancellation.

      • viewRequestStatus

        public java.lang.String viewRequestStatus(java.lang.String email)
        This method allows a user to view all of their current adoption requests
        Parameters:
        email - A user's email
        Returns:
        A string representation of all of the user's adoption requests

      • reviewRequestStatus

        public java.lang.String reviewRequestStatus(java.lang.String petID)
        This method allows for the viewing of all adoption requests attached to a pet
        Parameters:
        petID - A pet's identification number
        Returns:
        string representation of all of the pet's adoption requests
